name: All For One
description: All For One is a fantasy-themed "Zero-Sum Free-For-All". When you defeat an enemy player, you gain all their accumulated experience points (XP), no matter how much stronger or weaker your foes are. Use experience points to unlock new abilities, weapons and skills so you can face stronger opponents.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-7300HQ  3.50  GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050M 4GB DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
